info.name: OpenSSH username enumeration < v7.3
author: iamthefrogy
forgedhallpass
info.description: OpenSSH before 7.3 is vulnerable to username enumeration and DoS vulnerabilities.

response: SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_6.7p1 Debian-5+deb8u8

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 56307
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 56307
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 5, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	5 ALT1.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	10 ALT4.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	1 ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	10 ALT3.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	5 ALT2.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13071
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13071
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
unif.fr.	10800	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 ip4:192.33.182.249 include:_spf.google.com ~all"
